comment: Move class substitution in and out of the converse of a relation. Version of ~ csbcnvgALT without a sethood antecedent but depending on more axioms. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Feb-2017.) (Revised by NM, 23-Aug-2018.)
